responses.gpt4: Good. Being informed truly makes a huge difference. If you have any other questions later on, don't hesitate to reach out to us. Do you have any other concerns or worries that you'd like to discuss now?
responses.our_model: That's fantastic. It sounds like you're well-prepared. Just to remind you, you don't have to do anything just yet. But you'll need to start your bowel prep 24 hours before your procedure by drinking only clear liquids which involves no solid foods and drinking either clear or light colored beverages without any red or purple dye. Can I share some examples of what clear liquids are and you can tell me what questions you have about the diet?
